item.title: Dialogue tele isn't working
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

yes i know you figured it out, this post still has some resources for you

I’ve always kinda thought it’s stupid how those people never tell you the case ids for dialogues.
News flash people: They don’t change in any 317 client unless you modified the code that sends the clicking buttons, or you modified the actual dialogues in the Client.

case 9157 is the first click option for the 2 line dialogue
case 9158 is the second click option for the 2 line dialogue

Your code is structured a bit strange in 9157.

I loaded the code up into a Java Beautifier because I was too lazy to format it myself, and upon doing so, it was apparent that you were missing SOME brackets.

Here are some tips:

  1. Avoid nesting if statements when possible. In some cases you just have to, but still avoid it.
  2. When doing things like this:

if(c.dialogueAction == 102) { if((c.playerLevel[14] < 90)) { c.sendMessage("You need 90 Mining to Enter the Mining Guild"); } else { if((c.playerLevel[14] > 90)) { c.getPA().movePlayer(3046, 9755, 0); c.sendMessage("You enter the Glorious Mining Guild.."); }
You want to make the code as minimal as possible. You can accomplish this by only checking if the player does not have the requirements.
Ex:

if (c.dialogueAction == 102) { if (c.playerLevel[14] < 90) {// Checking if level is under 90 c.sendMessage("You need 90 Mining to Enter the Mining Guild");// if it is, send a game message break;// breaks the switch statement, so it does not continue after this point. Therefore not teleporting the player anywhere. } c.getPA().movePlayer(3046, 9755, 0);// Made it past the if statement, they have 90+ mining, move them. c.sendMessage("You enter the Glorious Mining Guild..");// send game message }
3) Tabbing is important. I figured out how and where you were missing your brackets based on the tabbing that was seen in the beautifier I linked above. It’s not there for no reason.
4) You may want to removeAllWindows before those sendMessages are sent (Tip: Put it before where it checks the player level so you don’t have to do it twice), otherwise the dialogues will still be shown and they won’t see the message until they walk.

Read full topic

item.title: Dialogue tele isn't working
item.dc:creator: @trilogy-reborn trilogy-reborn
item.description:
@trilogy-reborn wrote:

oh actually i looked real carefully at my code so i could find out what i did wrong when writing my code and i figured it out.
sadly it was an obvious mistake but it didnt notice it because i was thinking my entire code was written wrong.

my original code:

if(c.dialogueAction == 102) { if((c.playerLevel[14] < 90)) { c.sendMessage("You need 90 Mining to Enter the Mining Guild"); } else { if((c.playerLevel[14] > 90)) { c.getPA().movePlayer(3046, 9755, 0); c.sendMessage("You enter the Glorious Mining Guild.."); }

After looking real carefully i noticed i had 2 closing brackets and 4 opening brackets so i just added 2 closing brackets to the end.

working finished code:

if(c.dialogueAction == 102) { if((c.playerLevel[14] < 90)) { c.sendMessage("You need 90 Mining to Enter the Mining Guild"); } else { if((c.playerLevel[14] > 90)) { c.getPA().movePlayer(3046, 9755, 0); c.sendMessage("You enter the Glorious Mining Guild.."); } } }

even though it was a simple problem that i noticed just by looking at my code i thank everyone who tries to help cause its nice to know when i have a problem i can post it here and i normally get a reply from this community in no time.(:

Read full topic

item.title: Dialogue tele isn't working
item.dc:creator: @trilogy-reborn trilogy-reborn
item.description:
@trilogy-reborn wrote:

EDit: Sorry this is long guys… i was told my help threads needed to be a little more descriptive so that people can properly find the help i need and that i need to try harder on my projects before asking for help and mention what ive figured out on my own so far since most people dont want too spoon feed me if i am not trying hard to figure it out myself.
I think ive gotten really close to figuring this one out on my own.(:

My info

Server & source: xenon
Link: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=662648.0

Goal: make a npc that had some dialogue that asks if you want to go to mining guild. if you click I’d like to "enter your mining guild " then if your under 90 mining he tells you to first get 90 mining. if over 90 mining you tele into mining guild which ive made semi-custom and well worth going too.

Guide im following to help me:
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/tutorials/385489-pi-dialogues-depth-guide-beginner.html

in the guide i am at the “Making the Clickable Options do Something” part and im nearly done i am just having a little trouble with my buttonaction code.

*this is the step i was on:
The **** should be replaced with the number that was inputted into the server console when pressing a button. Since my console outputted 9158 i would search for case 9158.

Now that you have found your case, right underneath it make an if statement. Like so:
Code:if(c.dialogueAction == ***) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(17, 2258); }

but because i didnt want to bring up another dialogue; i wanted it to teleport me i tried to make my own code for the tele with lvl reqs.

*here is the code i got sofar:

if(c.dialogueAction == 102) { if((c.playerLevel[14] < 90)) { c.sendMessage("You need 90 Mining to Enter the Mining Guild"); } else { if((c.playerLevel[14] > 90)) { c.getPA().movePlayer(3046, 9755, 0); c.sendMessage("You enter the Glorious Mining Guild.."); }

that wasnt working so i tried doing a code like this:

} if ((c.dialogueAction == 102) && (c.playerLevel[14] > 90)) { c.getPA().movePlayer(3046, 9755, 0); } if ((c.dialogueAction == 102) && (c.playerLevel[14] < 90)) { c.sendMessage("You need 90 Mining to Enter the Mining Guild"); }

This is my case 9157 so you can see where in the code i thought it should go:

[code] case 9157://barrows tele to tunnels

if(c.dialogueAction == 102) {
if((c.playerLevel[14] < 90)) {
c.sendMessage(“You need 90 Mining to Enter the Mining Guild”);
} else {
if((c.playerLevel[14] > 90)) {
c.getPA().movePlayer(3046, 9755, 0);
c.sendMessage(“You enter the Glorious Mining Guild…”);
}

		if (c.dialogueAction == 3516) {
                c.getItems().addItem(4317, 1);
                c.getItems().addItem(1007, 1);
                c.sendMessage("You've obtained the Completionist Cape!");
                }
			if(c.dialogueAction == 1) {
				int r = 4;
				//int r = Misc.random(3);
				switch(r) {
					case 0:
						c.getPA().movePlayer(3534, 9677, 0);
						break;
					
					case 1:
						c.getPA().movePlayer(3534, 9712, 0);
						break;
					
					case 2:
						c.getPA().movePlayer(3568, 9712, 0);
						break;
					
					case 3:
						c.getPA().movePlayer(3568, 9677, 0);
						break;
					case 4:
						c.getPA().movePlayer(3551, 9694, 0);
						break;
				}
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 2) {
				c.getPA().movePlayer(2507, 4717, 0);
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 56) {
				
	if (c.Wheel == 0) {
	c.getDH().sendDialogues(57, 945);
	} else if (c.Wheel > 0) {
	c.getItems().addItem(c.getPA().Wheel(), 1);
	c.Wheel = (c.Wheel - 1);
	c.getDH().sendDialogues(58, 945);
	}
	break;	
	} else if (c.dialogueAction == 997) {
				c.getPA().enterZombies();
				c.sendMessage("Good luck! Have a Happy Zombie RAMPAGE!");		
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 5) {
				c.getSlayer().giveTask();
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 6) {
				c.getSlayer().giveTask2();
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 44) {
				c.getPA().enterZombies();
				c.sendMessage("Good luck! Have a Happy Zombie RAMPAGE!");
			}else if (c.dialogueAction == 186) {
                                    Server.lottery.enterLottery(c);
                                    c.getPA().removeAllWindows();
                                    return;
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 7) {
				c.getPA().startTeleport(3088,3933,0,"modern");
				c.sendMessage("NOTE: You are now in the wilderness...");
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 29) {
				c.getPA().sendFrame126("" + Config.VOTE4CASH + "", 12000);
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 50) {
				c.getPA().startTeleport(2661,3307,0,"modern");
				c.sendMessage("This is PVP");
		} else if (c.dialogueAction == 51) {
				c.getPA().startTeleport(3007,3631,0,"modern");
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 8) {
				c.getPA().resetBarrows();
				c.sendMessage("Your barrows have been reset.");
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 13) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(1762, 5180, 0);
				c.dialogueAction = -1;

} else if (c.dialogueAction == 27) {
c.getPA().movePlayer(3210, 3424, 0);
c.monkeyk0ed = 0;
c.Jail = false;
c.forcedText = “I swear to god that i will never break the rules anymore!”;
c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
c.updateRequired = true;
}
c.dialogueAction = 0;
c.getPA().removeAllWindows();
break;[/code]

what ive tried sofar:
-both of the codes that i wrote above.
-moving them to different spots in the case 9157 (including after “switch”.
adding "break;"
removing } from end
adding another } to end (kinda figured wouldnt help but tried anyways

but after compliling with this as my case 9157:

[code] case 9157://barrows tele to tunnels

if(c.dialogueAction == 102) {
if((c.playerLevel[14] < 90)) {
c.sendMessage(“You need 90 Mining to Enter the Mining Guild”);
} else {
if((c.playerLevel[14] > 90)) {
c.getPA().movePlayer(3046, 9755, 0);
c.sendMessage(“You enter the Glorious Mining Guild…”);

		if (c.dialogueAction == 3516) {

					case 0:

						break;

						break;

						break;
				}
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 2) {
				c.getPA().movePlayer(2507, 4717, 0);
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 56) {
				
	if (c.Wheel == 0) {
	c.getDH().sendDialogues(57, 945);
	} else if (c.Wheel > 0) {
	c.getItems().addItem(c.getPA().Wheel(), 1);
	c.Wheel = (c.Wheel - 1);
	c.getDH().sendDialogues(58, 945);
	}
	break;	
	} else if (c.dialogueAction == 997) {
				c.getPA().enterZombies();
				c.sendMessage("Good luck! Have a Happy Zombie RAMPAGE!");		
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 5) {
				c.getSlayer().giveTask();
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 6) {
				c.getSlayer().giveTask2();
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 44) {
				c.getPA().enterZombies();
				c.sendMessage("Good luck! Have a Happy Zombie RAMPAGE!");
			}else if (c.dialogueAction == 186) {
                                    Server.lottery.enterLottery(c);
                                    c.getPA().removeAllWindows();
                                    return;
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 7) {
				c.getPA().startTeleport(3088,3933,0,"modern");
				c.sendMessage("NOTE: You are now in the wilderness...");
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 29) {
				c.getPA().sendFrame126("" + Config.VOTE4CASH + "", 12000);
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 50) {
				c.getPA().startTeleport(2661,3307,0,"modern");
				c.sendMessage("This is PVP");
		} else if (c.dialogueAction == 51) {
				c.getPA().startTeleport(3007,3631,0,"modern");
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 8) {
				c.getPA().resetBarrows();
				c.sendMessage("Your barrows have been reset.");
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 13) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(1762, 5180, 0);
				c.dialogueAction = -1;

} else if (c.dialogueAction == 27) {
c.getPA().movePlayer(3210, 3424, 0);
c.monkeyk0ed = 0;
c.Jail = false;
c.forcedText = “I swear to god that i will never break the rules anymore!”;
c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
c.updateRequired = true;
}
c.dialogueAction = 0;
c.getPA().removeAllWindows();
break;[/code]

this is my compiling error i got:

[code]src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:3113: error: orphaned case

                    case 9158:
                    ^

src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:4776: error: reached end o
f file while parsing
}
^
2 errors
ECHO is off.
Xenon Has Completely Finished its Compiling!
ECHO is off.
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

i thought orphaned error meant it needed to be between the “switch” and its closing bracket but moving it there didnt help.

i know either

  1. my code is just slightly wrong and needs to be rewrote
    or
  2. my code is in the wrong place.

ive worked pretty hard on this and i know im really close but i would really like some help on it so even if you dont want to spoon feed me the answer maybe someone can give me a little push in the right direction/ hint to me how to get this done maybe
